E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1975
Subject: Progress of Willie Wilson
Dear Sir,
Willie Wilson has an AVG of .282 at A San Jose Bees!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1975
Subject: Status of Rick Down
Dear Sir,
Rick Down isn't hitting the ball at all at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .237, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1975
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Bob Sadowski
